climbs.name: Wicked Good Chode
climbs.fa: Sam Owings, Eric Charlton and Tony Egnozzi  (1992)

content.description: Climb past 3 bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location: Start 5 feet right of Confirmed Insanity.

content.description: Begin by scrambling up the chimney, 15 ft. right of Being There. Work up on incuts and edges. Continue up the face staying right of the arête. Climb edges and incuts into the shallow groove and over a series of bulges to an anchor on the ledge.
content.location: 30 ft. Up the gully, right of Being There.

content.description: Begin climbing on small edges and flakes, up and left to a stance. Continue up the face and over a bulge. Continue on small positive holds the the ledge.
content.protection: P1 - 6 bolts, P2 - 7 bolts and anchors.
content.location: Scramble up the gully, right of Being There, to a narrowing. Begin climbing up and left from a flat stance.

content.description: Climb past 14 bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location: Start on the far left side of the buttress.

content.description: Climb past 6 bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location: Start 5 feet right of Wicked Good Chode.

content.description: Scramble up the gulley left of the Freezer Burn Wall to a stance on large blocks in the gulley below the broad rounded arête. Climb the slab up and to the left on nice rounded holds and edges to a 3 bolt anchor (30 ft) or clip a bolt and continue up the arête. Climb the wild and exposed arete past 11 bolts to a stance with cold shuts on the crest of the buttress. The short 3rd pitch continues up and left and over a bulge to a bolted anchor. The difficulties on the top pitch aren't over once the bulge is pulled as finding an anchor can be problematic and the walk off to the base is long.
content.protection:
P1 - no pro.

P2 - 11 bolts

P3 - 3 bolts
content.location: The crest of the long buttress up and left of the Freezer Burn Wall and Voices Wall.
